term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - complete active space self-consistent field second-order perturbation theory (CASPT2)
term.title: complete active space self-consistent field second-order perturbation theory

item.text: Theoretical scheme suitable for computations of accurate excitation energies and reaction barriers. In the first step, electron correlation is taken into account only to a certain extent by using a CASSCF formalism (the so called non-dynamic correlation), whereas the remaining electron correlation (the so called dynamic correlation) is included through the use of second-order perturbation theory.
